features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR bonded fleece repels water while staying soft, stretchy, and comfortable
Fleece backer for added warmth; Stretch back neck tape for reinforcement
Stretch binding at cuffs and hem with stretch-binding thumb loops
Kangaroo pocket and stash pocket; Interior pocket media port
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
